Posts.Title: Round block mammoplasty

Posts.Content: Hi Tracy, thanks for the kind welcome, A round block mammoplasty is cutting the nipple off, cutting through breast and removing cancer then stitching nipple back on.. Sounds rather easy yes,, but guess its not and painful too, I see my surgen this week, and have been given a choice of either the round block or single masectomy with reconstruction followed by RT. I am really unsure as to which way to go, and very frightened by it all and joined this forum tonight to see if anyone had had this procedure. Many thanks Mandy x
